thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Suzanne

author: Suzanne
title: Suzanne
text: After looking at many airline sites directly and some web sights for cheap flights flight hub was the quickest and easiest direct way to find the least expensive flight with out crazy long layovers. Thank you flight hub. I found a good flight to Las Vegas for less than the best price on west jet, aircanada, air Alaska, and delta. It was also a good flight with limited layovers. :)
